name: Spookto - Gluton
description:
This game is made for spooktober.

Description:

Spookto - Gluton is a story about a man that awake very hungry. He want to get the food, but there are many obstacle that he need to avoid.

Disclaimer: The grammar in this game is very bad. That's because English is not my main language, but I still learn to be better at English. If you found a bug, mistakes on spelling or sentence, you can email me at:

putragonist@gmail.com

with subject [game bug]. I will try my best to fix it if I can.
